tagline: With a button in the box that allows you to see the password when the user clicks on it and hide when the user no longer holds the button as in W8
name: Jquerypasswordrevelator
body:
jquerypasswordrevelator
=======================

With a button in the box that allows you to see the password when the user clicks on it and hide when the user no longer holds the button as in W8
